transcript:
Executive: Ji namaste, IndiaMART se [inaudible] baat kar raha hu.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir, main aapko call kiya tha aapke refund ke regarding baat karne ke liye, sir.
Customer: Haan ji.
Executive: Sir, aapka refund jo hai woh process ho gaya hai, sir. Aapko teen se chaar working days mein aapke account mein aa jayega, sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Aur sir, aapko koi dikkat ya pareshaani ho toh aap mujhe call kar sakte hai, sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai, sir. Dhanyavaad, sir.
Customer: Dhanyavaad.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's concern was regarding the refund.



Resolution:

- Executive informed refund has been processed.

- Refund will be credited in 3-4 working days.



Next Steps: 

- None



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, account, process
